text: Mitzi Hoag (born Margaret Hoag; September 25, 1932 - February 26, 2019) was an American actress. She appeared in more than 73 different TV shows and movies. Her best known roles are in We'll Get By, Bonanza, Here Come the Brides, The Facts of Life and The Partridge Family. Hoag died on February 26, 2019 in Sherman Oaks, California, aged 86.Mitzi Hoag Beggs ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from Illinois
title: Mitzi Hoag
